name: part_003
file: tmp_„Äê3D BIRTHDAY LIVE„ÄëLet's party and sing with good friends! üéÇüéâ #RissaHatchDay25 [_mThZIRqIBs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Nerissa prepares to sit in the chair and wear a blindfold while the others cheer.
Nerissa explains the rules of the game 'Cellmate's in Love'.
The game begins, and the members decide the order while Nerissa puts on her blindfold.
The first prompt 'First Date!' is displayed, and Mococo prepares to go first.
Mococo performs her 'First Date' scenario using a deep, distorted voice changer.
Biboo prepares for her turn and starts her 'First Date' scenario with a different voice changer.

subtitles.original: It's fine. I'm going to be sitting...

subtitles.original: ...in this chair right here...
subtitles.english: ...in this chair right here...

subtitles.original: ...and I'm going to put on a blindfold, too.
subtitles.english: ...and I'm going to put on a blindfold, too.

subtitles.original: Oh! Wait! Why?
subtitles.english: Oh! Wait! Why?

subtitles.original: Why? Why?
subtitles.english: Why? Why?

subtitles.original: Don't worry, don't worry. It's Piyanas.
subtitles.english: Don't worry, don't worry. It's Piyanas.

subtitles.original: Piyanas! Piyanas! Piyanas! Piyanas!
subtitles.english: Piyanas! Piyanas! Piyanas! Piyanas!

subtitles.original: You guys can relax, okay? Relax.
subtitles.english: You guys can relax, okay? Relax.

subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.english: ...with various questions and situations will appear.

subtitles.original: So, you all have to answer them one by one.
subtitles.english: So, you all have to answer them one by one.

subtitles.original: Your voices are going to be altered with a voice changer.
subtitles.english: Your voices are going to be altered with a voice changer.

subtitles.original: Oh! What? Is it going to be cute?
subtitles.english: Oh! What? Is it going to be cute?

subtitles.original: Yeah! But I'm not going to be able to know who's talking.
subtitles.english: Yeah! But I'm not going to be able to know who's talking.

subtitles.original: So, based on that, I won't have any...
subtitles.english: So, based on that, I won't have any...

subtitles.original: ...preconceptions about anyone...
subtitles.english: ...preconceptions about anyone...

subtitles.original: ...because it'll just be based on your rizz alone.
subtitles.english: ...because it'll just be based on your rizz alone.

subtitles.original: So feel free to be extra romantic, okay?
subtitles.english: So feel free to be extra romantic, okay?

subtitles.english: What?! Extra romantic? What's that, Shiori?

subtitles.english: Don't worry about it!

subtitles.english: We'll do our best to be romantic then, huh?!

subtitles.english: Yeah! Oh!

subtitles.original: Let's start!
subtitles.english: Let's start!

subtitles.english: The name of the game is...

subtitles.original: Cellmate's in Love!
subtitles.english: Cellmate's in Love!

subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.english: First Date!

subtitles.original: Rissa... it's been over two years since Rissa and I became friends...
subtitles.english: Rissa... it's been over two years since Rissa and I became friends...

subtitles.original: ...but I think it's time to take our relationship beyond friendship!
subtitles.english: ...but I think it's time to take our relationship beyond friendship!

subtitles.original: Whoa!
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: I'm scared I might ruin things, but I also really want to tell her how I feel!
subtitles.english: I'm scared I might ruin things, but I also really want to tell her how I feel!

subtitles.original: So, everyone, gather your courage...
subtitles.english: So, everyone, gather your courage...

subtitles.original: ...and finally decide to ask Nerissa out on a date!
subtitles.english: ...and finally decide to ask Nerissa out on a date!

subtitles.original: What would you say to her, and where would you like to go for your first date?
subtitles.english: What would you say to her, and where would you like to go for your first date?

subtitles.original: Try to ask her smoothly!
subtitles.english: Try to ask her smoothly!

subtitles.original: That was a lot!

subtitles.english: Okay, so it's not just a hypothetical situation, right?

subtitles.original: That's a lot of points, isn't it?
subtitles.english: That's a lot of points, isn't it?

subtitles.original: We all have to figure out how to ask her out.
subtitles.english: We all have to figure out how to ask her out.
